title: Crafting a Cool Language Translation App with Langflow
description:
In this livestream we’ll show you how to create an awesome language translation app using Langflow!

We’ll demonstrate how Langflow helps us visually build a GenAI workflow with multiple large language models (LLMs), no-code needed. Watch as we'll use Elevenlabs.io for real-time voice generation, allowing the app to speak in the author's voice. You'll see the app perform real-time language translation from any language to any other, along with additional features like sentiment analysis and language detection.

Resources:
Langflow: https://www.langflow.org/
Babbelfish Github: https://github.com/SonicDMG/babbelfish.ai
Eleven labs https://elevenlabs.io/
Streamlit: ​​https://streamlit.io/gallery

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
